ERROR_MESSAGES.ALPHANUMERIC_ONLY: Please type English and number only

LISTING_INFO_LOCATION.HOW_TO_GO_DESCRIPTION:
A Thai voice instruction of how to go to the house.
Play this to a taxi driver.

LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.SECURITY_CHECK_DESCRIPTION:
The reception at the lobby might ask you to fill a form and give your passport to make a copy for a security procedure. 

 Please follow their request without resistance as it is only for formality and once for all.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.EARLY_CHECK_IN_N_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Early check-in or late check-out is ONLY possible if the house is vacant on the respective day
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_LUGGAGE_FIRST_DESCRIPTION: Luggage can be left first at 12:30
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.KEEP_LUGGAGE_ON_CHECK_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Luggage can be kept in one of our vacant houses, if any, after check out.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Please return the key card and tidy up the house as you check out.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_ON_THE_TABLE: Leave the keycards on the dinning table.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX: leave your key card in the mail box
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX_IMG_DESCR:
Please send us the photo of returned key card.

If the returned key card is lost without the photo, we will have to claim compensation for loss from you.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.LEAVE_KEY_CARD_IN_THE_MAIL_BOX_IMG_EXAMP: This is an example of the photo. Send the photo via Airbnb app or any of your favorite messenger.
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.CLEAN_CHECK_OUT_DESCRIPTION: Please tidy up the house and check your belongings for the next guests. We would appreciate your cooperation!
LISTING_INFO_CHECK_IN_OUT.REVIEW_US: Your 5 star review means A LOT to us. If you are satisfied with our service, please leave us some review :)

CONTACTS.ADD_CONTACTS_DESCRIPTION: Please add phone number or ID below in your preferred messenger

SERVICES.SHUTTLE_DESCRIPTION: Airport shuttle service provides a ride between the airport and the house. The service charge can be paid through Airbnb.
SERVICES.SHUTTLE_PICKUP_SPOT_INFO: Your driver will be waiting at the pick up spots below holding your name card.
SERVICES.SHUTTLE_PICKUP_SPOT_WARN: If you are delayed over an hour from arrival time, you will be charged an overtime fee.
SERVICES.SHUTTLE_CONFIRM_HEADER: Your request for pickup service will be placed like below
SERVICES.SHUTTLE_CONFIRM_INFO: We will send you a payment request through Airbnb shortly. Let us know if you can't proceed the payment.
